import React,{Fragment, useState} from 'react' let AddUser = () => { let [user , setUser] = useState({ first_name : '', last_name : '', email :'', gender :'', mobile_number : '' }); let inputValuesHandler = (e) =>{ setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } return ( 
{JSON.stringify(user)}

Add User

 ) } export default AddUser;
